prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Drums, Organ, Bass, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Drums, Organ, and Bass are the instruments featured in this song, but no Guitar.

Style 2: This song is composed of Reed, Drums, Organ, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 3: No Guitar is included in this song, which instead features Reed, Drums, Organ, and Bass.
